thread.title: Some Facebook users suffer through site outage
thread.title_full: Some Facebook users suffer through site outage

title: Some Facebook users suffer through site outage
text:
Some Facebook users suffer through site outage Site monitoring disruptions showed major outages over North America POSTED: 04:20 PM CDT Sep 28, 2015 Tweet John Sanders/CNN 
Facebook was inaccessible for some users Monday afternoon, CNBC reported, the social media site's second outage in less than a week. Related Content 
"We're currently restoring Facebook services that people had trouble accessing earlier today due to a configuration issue," a Facebook representative told CNBC. "We're working to bring things back to normal for everyone." 
A site that monitors disruptions on Facebook showed major outages over parts of North America. 
CNBC said a message displayed on facebook.com noted, "Sorry, something went wrong. We're working on it and we'll get it fixed as soon as we can." 
The site suffered a similar outage on Thursday. 
A quick check Monday afternoon showed the site back up and running. An ABC News story confirmed it.
